import React from "react"; import Head from "next/head"; import Layout from "../components/Layout"; const Home = () => (
Home

Programming

As a developer I have mostly worked in the fields of web development (JavaScript, node.js, React, three.js) and algorithmic geometry.

Skills

Programming languages: Python, JavaScript

I am a big enthusiast for the Python programming language, being very familiar with its syntax and inner workings. I follow PEPs (Python enhancement proposals) in order to always be up to date with language changes. I like Python for its clear and simple syntax and (mostly) lack of surprising behavior. JavaScript is my second language of choice, which I obviously use for client-side web development.

Web development: JavaScript, React, three.js

I am experienced with the development of interactive websites and web applications, having worked with jQuery, AngularJS, Bootstrap, React and interactive SVG and 3D content. On the server side I've mostly worked with Django, Python, and node.js

Maths

Posessing a master's degree in mathematics, my work as a developer has also involved creating sophisticated mathematical and gemetric algorithms for very specific problems of these fields. In developing these algorithms I have made use of my skills in NumPy, SymPy, SciPy, Sage, Open Cascade, Mathematica and MATLAB.

Portfolio

Cookie Cutter Customizer

A project for the startup Cookie Cutter Kingdom: providing a web-based 3D preview for customized, 3D-printed cookie cutters. The cookie cutters can be personalized with a text or traced from a user-provided image. I also developed an SVG-based drawing tool for creating cutters from custom outlines (not included in the final product)

visit website
view example (heart)

Kontobuch

A personal finance assistant for monitoring spending and income of Austrian bank accounts

Automatically categorizes transactions and visualizes the user's financial data in interactive charts

visit website

2048 3D

A small project in which I created a 3D version of the game 2048

visit website

Kubos

A simple desktop CAD application written in Python intended for use in schools (discontinued)

visit website

Kubos Blocks

A web-based 3D modeling application for creating objects by assembling blocks.

visit website

Tetr

A tool for creating web-based tetris games with customizable and diverse graphics options (ranging from 1984 console graphics to 3D)

visit website

Pythagoras Trainer

A web app that lets pupils do exercises on the pythagorean theorem. Provides randomized tasks that yield integer results

visit website

Stock Chart

An interactive stock chart that lets users select a stock symbol and timeframe; based on Angular

visit website

); export default Home;
